misc module¶

misc.handle_package(package, class_name)¶

This function is used by the parse_functions()

Input

@func_str string name of a function g.e. “ReLU”

Return

Function definition object (not instantiated) g.e. nn.ReLU

misc.action2one_hot(action_space: int, action_idx: int, numpy: bool = True) → numpy.ndarray¶

Returns a one-hot encoded numpy.ndarray

misc.action2one_hot_v(action_space: int, action_idx: int) → None._VariableFunctions.tensor¶

Returns a one-hot encoded torch.tensor

misc.warn_with_traceback(message, category, filename, lineno, file=None, line=None)¶

Utility for debugging Comment last line to enable/disable

misc.one_hot_from_logits(logits, dim=0)¶
misc.terminate_process()¶
